Our chosen challenge: help families with autistic children discover suitable activities for their kids.  Many autistic children are highly sensitive to sensory input and have narrow interests. Parents often struggle to find appropriate activities, which can make family interactions stressful. With CozySteps, we aimed to reduce decision fatigue for parents and make daily life more enjoyable for everyone.    ğŸ¤– What We Built  We created a mobile app prototype called CozySteps, with an activity recommendation engine powered by Large Language Models (LLMs).
